title: Feel like doing some smalltalk (AMA)
body:
Been a while since I've done one of these but we know the drill by now.
Be it music
Mordekaiser
Food
Philosophical Questions
Mordekaiser
English literature
Pop culture
Mordekaiser
or Mordekaiser

Just feel free to babble on about whatever comes to your mind^^
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.fireden.net%2Fvg%2Fimage%2F1439%2F46%2F1439467237663.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425

replies.body:
Did you know Syndra is way way way way way more powerful than Mordekaiser?


Deal with it!

http://i.imgur.com/Lg0z4X3.jpg

What was that?
Can't hear you over me 1v5ing the enemy team

What was that? I canÂ´t hear you over the sound of immense power to your face!

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rTPXy5-FrGc/Uc8A3ZZOkFI/AAAAAAAANqk/3KuXgyYIfxc/s318/schoolbags.gif

Is that why Syndra cant handle 3 bang bang bang from Mord?
Too weak afterward ;....;
Do you speak spanish?

I understand most of it but don't speak it myself.

The languages I'm familiar with to varying degrees are:
English
German
Italian
French

And seeing that my brother's learning Japanese I'll be passively learning some of it too. If I want to or not...
Nice, just you might be called a weeb LUL

I don't watch a lot of anime, sooo.

Netflix and other OG TV series' where it's at!

Is Mordekaiser prone to rusting with prolonged exposure to salt water? Asking for a friend.
{{champion:267}}

Well, he's kinda old fashioned and still wears heavy IRON armor.

Prone to getting rusty after prolonged exposure to salt water, usually in form of the tears of his enemies
Do you live in the German or French speaking part of Confoederatio Helvetica?
German speaking part^^
PENIS

Argument of the thead: "**Small** talks"

How to self roast xD
RIP
Where does Mordekaiser go to shine his armor?

Taric's salon.
The man's got everything you'd want to make yourself look stunning when charging into the fray.

Hell, even Darius and Garen frequent this establishment without tearing it apart in a moment of bitter rivalry
Would you prefer Riot to make a Candy Tyrant Mordekaiser skin or a Dark Star Mordekaiser skin?

Don't be this cruel D:

I don't wanna choose but if I had to I'd pick Candy Tyrant Morde.

Just for shits and skittles
If someone had a hypothetical Mordekaiser rework that they weren't sure actually went _far enough_ but nonetheless wanted to share, would you read it?
Sure, why not?

Passive: Iron Man
Whenever an enemy is damaged by one of Mordekaiser's abilities he generates a shield amount equal to 30% of the cost of the ability, reduced to 10% against minions. The shield's maximum amount is equal to 25% of Mordekaiser's maximum health. After a three second delay, Mordekaiser's shield decays at a rate of 2% of Mordekaiser's maximum health per second.

Q: Mace of Spades
5% Max Health
Passive: Mordekaiser's basic attacks deal 10/20/30/40/50 +(1% per 25 AD)(1% per 50 AP) of Mordekaiser's max health as bonus magic damage. This bonus damage contributes to Mordekaiser's Iron Man shield.
Active: Mordekaiser's next three basic attacks become empowered, doubling the passive bonus damage and converting his basic attack's damage to magic damage. For the first two Mordekaiser swings his runic mace in an arc, dealing damage to all enemies struck. For the third strike Mordekaiser swings his mace down, tripling the passive bonus damage and damaging all enemies in the area. Mace of Spades applies both on-hit and on-spell effects.

W: Harvester of Sorrow
10% Max Health
Mordekaiser generates an aura around the target, linking them to him for 4 seconds. After 2 seconds, Mordekaiser can recast the ability to end it prematurely.
Enemy Cast: Enemies near the targeted enemy are also damaged for 20/25/30/35/40% of the damage dealt to the targeted enemy. The damage dealt to the target and nearby enemies is stored as **Agony**. After 4 seconds or recasting the ability, Mordekaiser steals health from the target equal to the amount of **Agony** stored.
Ally Cast: Mordekaiser and the target ally gain 75 movement speed while moving in the other's direction. 20/25/30/35/40% of the damage dealt by Mordekaiser and the target ally is stored as **Agony**. After 4 seconds or recasting the ability, Mordekaiser and his ally are each healed for 50% of the **Agony** stored.

E: Siphon of Destruction
1% Max Health per Second
Mordekaiser generates a cone of spectral absorption that deals 10/30/50/70/90 (+.35 AP) magic damage per second. Enemies under the effect of Harvester of Sorrow have 10/20/30/40/50% of their movement speed stolen by Mordekaiser over 3 seconds and contribute Siphon of Destruction's full health cost to Iron Man. Mordekaiser retains the stolen movement speed for 3 seconds after either Harvester of Sorrow's or Siphon of Destruction's effects have ended. While Siphon of Destruction is active, Mordekaiser cannot attack or cast other spells.

R: Children of the Grave
Passive- Dragon Force: If Mordekaiser contributes to the takedown of the Dragon, Mordekaiser enslaves its spirit for 10 seconds. Dragon Force will kill Mordekaiser's current ghost and disable Children of the Grave's current effects, and casting Children of the Grave will kill the Dragon.
Active: Mordekaiser curses the target enemy, stealing 5/6.5/7% (+1% per 50 AP) of the target's health as magic damage before dealing 15/19.5/21% (+1% per 16.67 AP) damage over 10 seconds. Cursed enemies are afflicted with the same aura as Harvester of Sorrow, healing Mordekaiser for any damage inflicted by its effects.
--------
I'll admit, I didn't even TRY renaming or completely redoing any abilities, partly because I don't know jack shit about metal music outside of Pentakill and "Indestructible" by Disturbed. I mainly just went with trying to make what he's got already healthier while retaining an appropriately thematic feel.
On a scale of 1-100, what level of pain do your enemies feel when they face you?
Have you yet seen Stranger Things?

I binged watched it.
Started eight in the evening, finished four in the morning

That's how you fuckin' do it.

What did you think?

Season 2 when?

I needs it nao!
to shred or not to shred?

That isn't a question.

Always B shreddin'
_I love that Reading Glasses Morde drawing btw_
By the way, can you give me the link of that CertainlyT stream?
https://www.twitch.tv/leagueoflegends/v/93034347
https://www.twitch.tv/leagueoflegends/v/93034347
Does Mordekaiser like Shenpai?

Depends.

Did he notice him?

Ah okay. Just be on the lookout for someone asking you about Morde.

I referred him to you after he mentioned wanting to learn Mordekaiser.  He already owns him and is already hooked.

Ask him which his favorite skin is.

Depending on the answer the coaching will vary.

What a coincidence, he replied to my "favorite skin" thread. 

His IGN is Japanese Crab and he's level 10.

He's planning on getting his King of Clubs skin.

Oh, level 10, huh?

Good thing Morde really works well against those who have no clue about what he does^^

Tell me about it. 

I tried him last week on rotation and good lord it was easy to get fed off of 3rd Qs that were up when my opponent decided to all in me.

I would like your input on a ground-targeted Morde W version I drew in paint please!
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/d18ec966676fb5ff133f7f38c82dae6f91aec4520666253890f6b21121c9876b.jpg

The AoE kinda sticks to whatever walks through it for a bit after they leave the area, and if he Qs a shrapnel target it'll hurt the other shrapnel-affected units too.  
(kinda like old Q did except not as random?)

Thanks.

-LostFr0st
Are you currently taking on apprentices of the Master of Metal?
Always recruiting minions and lackeys
how many times per day/week do you play as mord?

At least once whenever I decide to get some games under my belt.
Usually end up playing him 80% of my games

On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your pain?

Also, are you familiar with this dude? He is pretty good.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YjEGRAEcbQU

It fcking melts 11
